amendatorysection.catchline: Request; allowance in part; issuance of warrant.
amendatorysection.para: When a request has been in part allowed by the Department of Administrative Services, a warrant shall be drawn as in other cases in which the whole request is allowed.

annotation.para: State warrant is not negotiable instrument. Bartley v. State, 53 Neb. 310, 73 N.W. 744 (1898).
